level_1: Empty repos — no README, no files.
level_2: Projects without any screenshots or live link.
README with just one line — no clarity.
level_3: No visible work or too many unfinished repos.
Bad code structure — everything in one file.
level_4: No mention of role or tech stack in team projects.
Link broken or project not working when recruiter clicks.

level_1: Don't leave repos without content or README.
Avoid uploading copied code without edits.
level_2: Don’t use same project in multiple names — shows laziness.
Write in simple language — your project should explain itself.
level_3: Avoid over-designing your site with no working features.
Make sure links work and images are visible.
level_4: Review your portfolio every month — don’t leave old projects broken.
Track which projects people visit or fork the most.
